about_the_game:
Split Apart is a retro survival horror game about envy. Explore the remnants of your distant past and fight off its demons as they attempt to take hold of you.

This demo will introduce you to the gameplay and atmosphere of Split Apart, featuring the opening 15 minutes of the first level of the game.

THE STORY

You were meant to meet with someone you thought you had lost a long time ago, but something had gone horribly wrong. You woke up to find yourself in a dirty bathtub. The place you are in is in a state of absolute disrepair, but somehow, it feels familiar to you. There's an unrelenting stench of mold and hostility permeating the stale air of this seemingly abandoned apartment complex. You need to find a way out of this place, by any means necessary.

DEMO FEATURES

  • Classic survival horror gameplay with emphasis on action and exploration

  • Third person cinematic camera with tank controls

  • Low poly PS1 aesthetics

  • A short introduction to the story that can be completed in under 15 minutes
